entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Buchans
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
